item.title: Why I migrate my blog from Jekyll to Hugo
item.description: I wrote my blogs using Jekyll at this domain almost two years occasionally from 2018 until 2020. I didnâ€™t think to move to Hugo before it was used in one of my company project. After two or three weeks since the project kicked off, I had a thought why not move to Hugo considering several benefits. For the uninitiated, Hugo is one of the most popular open-source static site generators.
